text:
MANY other things now are looking interesting as #antivirals, so *seems the 👇list is kind of *outdated* now.

But I think all 3 (#Remdesivir, #Favipiravir and #Chloroquine CQ) *will probably have a place on the 💊#treatment 💊spectrum while other 💊 are tested/dev'd.

#COVID19 https://t.co/zgPW0lQAhq
